column3: Faculty of Engineering and Physical Sciences
column5: Develop the theoretical knowledge and practical skills to design and engineer the next generation of connected devices and systems on this Internet of Things master’s course. You’ll learn about key hardware and software components, and the tools and methods to protect and optimise them. The course combines elements of computer science and electronics, and is ideal if you’ve graduated from either discipline.On this Internet of Things MSc you’ll gain knowledge and practical skills in:
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
